name: Crawl
description: Crawl is the local multiplayer dungeon crawler where your friends control the monsters! Battle through dungeons and power up your hero - if a friend kills you they take your place and itâ€™s their turn to crawl. It's a race to gain enough XP and loot to take on the hulking final boss!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (sp2) or later Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA since 2006 (GeForce 8), AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000), Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended
